data.name: AboutUsCheckContent1
data.value: We help suppliers, importers and wholesalers showcase their products to buyers who are looking for great deals on wholesale beauty products.

data.name: AboutUsCheckContent2
data.value: Our sellers are ready to ship out their items directly to you. Plus we help you clean up with our quick and painless selling services.

data.name: AboutUsCheckContent3
data.value: Our network has been designed to help you find suppliers efficiently and to keep up to date with the latest developments in the industry.

data.name: AboutUsCheckContent4
data.value: We make finding suppliers a pleasant experience so you can spend more time improving your business.

data.name: AboutUsContent1
data.value: Zaan Marketplace is a one-stop shop for salon and spa supplies. Our goal is to make your life easier by helping you find what you need, giving you great advice on how to use it, then shipping it to you quickly and efficiently. We are a young company, built by like-minded professionals who love what they do, and we're excited to help our customers find the products they need in one convenient place.

data.name: AboutUsContent2
data.value: We strive to be the best online platform for beauty industry suppliers by committing ourselves to provide a selected, qualified and high quality set of suppliers to our customers in a trusted environment.

data.name: AllInOne
data.value: All-IN-ONE software management to manage and grow your salon and spa business .

data.name: Alwaysfocus
data.value: Always focus on your growth, and let the innovation for us.

data.name: AppointmentsContent
data.value: A fast and easy-to-use appointment book for front desk staff is just the start of our omnichannel booking experiences. Provide your guests (and staff) with the ease and convenience they expect.

data.name: BranchesmanagementContent
data.value: Open an unlimited number of branches for your business and follow them all from one place

data.name: CustomermanagementContent
data.value: With Zaan you can manage your customers' records in a wonderful way, as you can track their last visit and know some of the details that interest you about them with simple tools.

data.name: CustomerTestimonialContent1
data.value: I am so glad I found Zaan Marketplace before I wasted my time and money on other marketplaces.

data.name: CustomerTestimonialContent2
data.value: Hi there, Zaan has helped me reach out to a larger audience, I get a lot of views and sales here. It took some time to figure out how to use the tools but they are very helpful. So far so good!

data.name: CustomerTestimonialContent3
data.value: We're a very small company with a lot of private branded products. Zaan has helped us to sell our products in a bigger scale than before.

data.name: CustomerTestimonialContent4
data.value: We're a very small company with a lot of private branded products. Zaan has helped us to sell our products in a bigger scale than before.

data.name: DashboardContent1
data.value: Pull data from every aspect of your business, including sales, operations, marketing, staff performance and customer behavior.

data.name: DashboardContent2
data.value: You'll always have access to dashboard that are up-to-date and accurate, without the manual effort to collate your data outside of the system.

data.name: footerContent
data.value: Zaan salon software delivers everything you need for your salon and spa to optimize scheduling appointments, employee management, customer management, marketing, inventory, and much more..

data.name: InventoryContent1
data.value: A program that helps you control your inventory.

data.name: InventoryContent2
data.value: Streamline processes to manage inventory more efficiently. It's easy to withdraw and add to your products.

data.name: InventoryContent4
data.value: alerts warn you when stock is running low.

data.name: InventoryContent5
data.value: Find product suppliers that are intelligently integrated within the inventory, Keep track of your inventory products and lists of suppliers.

data.name: InvoiceContent
data.value: Zaan allows you to issue E- invoices in accordance with the requirements of the General Authority of Zakat and Income for the electronic invoice system, where you can issue your invoices with approved forms of tax invoice or simplified invoice, in addition to the program support for applicable taxes such as value-added tax and automatically included in the issued invoices, to Along with the required basic information such as the tax number of the customer, and the tax information of the institution.

data.name: InvoiceTitle
data.value: Start E- invoicing with the Zaan system approved by ZATCA

data.name: Iwantto
data.value: I want to start as a...

data.name: IwanttoContent
data.value: Zaan salon software delivers everything you need for your salon and spa to optimize scheduling appointments, employee management.

data.name: MarketingContent1
data.value: Zaan's marketing automation software is tailor-made for the salon and spa business. Our solution reduces the time and expense to plan and execute marketing programs. Most importantly, we help you grow revenue with lasting results.

data.name: MarketingContent2
data.value: We provide your salon with multiple options to do marketing and carefully select customers to target. From emails, text messages, offers and daily deals. Always be prepared to jump your salon sales!

data.name: OnestopshopContent1
data.value: Shop your salon and spa products from different suppliers from one place, compare prices, see reviews, leave your comments, Track your purchases, various payment options and more from inside Zaan's store.

data.name: OnestopshopContent2
data.value: Are you a supplier? Do you have your own products for beauty salons and spas?

data.name: OnestopshopContent3
data.value: Register now as a supplier and reach more customers

data.name: OurBestSell
data.value: Our Best Sell Product In This Week!

data.name: OurCustomerSaysContent
data.value: Our customers are the basis of our success, and they are the first motivation for us to develop and excel. We are always looking for their satisfaction and providing the best services that help them develop their business.

data.name: OurProductContent
data.value: Just one click and you have access to thousands of top-quality products. We do all the hard work for you by negotiating with suppliers so you can find exactly what you need, quickly and simply.

data.name: OurSupplierContent
data.value: A business is only as great as its suppliers. With the proper tools, you can make better decisions easily.

data.name: ProductsupplierContent1
data.value: Create a new market here for you and your customers

data.name: ProductsupplierContent2
data.value: Make your products reach the hands of your customers in a modern and innovative style

data.name: ReachOutTimeValidation
data.value: Please enter your reach out time

data.name: SalonOwnerContent1
data.value: Get the best management system to manage all aspects of your salon

data.name: SalonOwnerContent2
data.value: Make your business grow with Zan experts who are interested in providing everything needed to develop your business

data.name: scheduleacallContent
data.value: Check out Zaan's unique business model which allows small to medium-sized businesses to reach Thousands of consumers across Many countries through one platform.

data.name: ServiceManagementContent
data.value: Flexible system to list all services and any services provided by your salon. You can manage them by assigning them to employees, setting their prices and duration, as well as set them as packages and much more.

data.name: StaffmanagementContent
data.value: Manage employee roll, performance, leave and attendance with our all-in-one spa and salon staff management software.

data.name: Startmanaging
data.value: Start managing your beauty salon in just few minutes

data.name: Stayinformedonthelatestinsalons
data.value: Stay informed on the latest in salons and beauty products. Subscribe to our newsletter for expert tips, industry insights, new product reviews and more. Never miss a trend again, sign up now.

data.name: StoreBannerContent1
data.value: Zaan Marketplace is a platform that provides the best solution for connecting Beauty salon products manufacturers, distributors, wholesalers and service providers under one roof. With thousands of options, Zaan has every product you need to create the salon experience every customer deserves.

data.name: StoreBannerContent2
data.value: Join Zaan Marketplace as a seller and experience the beauty of ease, no hassle, simple yet organized

data.name: StoreBannerHeading
data.value: Beauty industry's one stop solution to grow your salon & spa business

data.name: Wedesigned
data.value: We design Zaan System to cover all your salon needs, to help you work beautifully
